testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlIntersectionSignalStatusUpdate dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.10.12 [Need to Monitor Signal Operation] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R937_Section_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R937_Section_Identifier_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Planned Signal Timing Mode Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R938_Planned_Signal_Timing_Mode_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R938_Planned_Signal_Timing_Mode_Description_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Timing Patten Identifier - Current is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R939_Timing_Patten_Identifier_-_Current_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R939_Timing_Patten_Identifier_-_Current_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Timing Pattern Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R940_Timing_Pattern_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R940_Timing_Pattern_Description_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Actuation Mode is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R941_Actuation_Mode_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R941_Actuation_Mode_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Plan Mode is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R942_Plan_Mode_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R942_Plan_Mode_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cycle Length - Planned is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R943_Cycle_Length_-_Planned_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R943_Cycle_Length_-_Planned_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cycle Length - Current is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R944_Cycle_Length_-_Current_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R944_Cycle_Length_-_Current_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cycle Length - Previous is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R945_Cycle_Length_-_Previous_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R945_Cycle_Length_-_Previous_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Master Cycle Length - Actual is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R946_Master_Cycle_Length_-_Actual_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R946_Master_Cycle_Length_-_Actual_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Cycle Counter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R947_Controller_Cycle_Counter_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R947_Controller_Cycle_Counter_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Master Cycle Counter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R948_Master_Cycle_Counter_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R948_Master_Cycle_Counter_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Offset Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R949_Offset_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R949_Offset_Reference_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Offset - Planned is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R950_Offset_-_Planned_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R950_Offset_-_Planned_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Offset - Actual is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R951_Offset_-_Actual_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R951_Offset_-_Actual_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Offset - Previous is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R952_Offset_-_Previous_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R952_Offset_-_Previous_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Timestamp is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R953_Controller_Timestamp_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R953_Controller_Timestamp_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Split is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.18). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R954_Phase_Split_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R954_Phase_Split_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Ring Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.19). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R955_Ring_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R955_Ring_Status_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Active Phases is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.20). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R956_Active_Phases_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R956_Active_Phases_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Greens is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.21). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R957_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R957_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Yellows is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.22). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R958_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R958_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Reds is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.23). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R959_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R959_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Walks is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.24). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R960_Phase_Status_Walks_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R960_Phase_Status_Walks_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Pedestrian Clearance is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.25). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R961_Phase_Status_Pedestrian_Clearance_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R961_Phase_Status_Pedestrian_Clearance_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Status Dont Walks is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.26). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R962_Phase_Status_Dont_Walks_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R962_Phase_Status_Dont_Walks_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Overlap Phase Status Greens is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.27). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R963_Overlap_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R963_Overlap_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Overlap Phase Status Yellows is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.28). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R964_Overlap_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R964_Overlap_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Overlap Phase Status Reds is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.29). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R965_Overlap_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R965_Overlap_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Special Functions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.30). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R966_Special_Functions_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R966_Special_Functions_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Preemption Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.11.2.5.2.31). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N97R967_Preemption_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N97R967_Preemption_Description_Supported}
Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 35 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 36 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 39 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 40 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 41 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 42 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 43 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 43.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalStatusUpdate PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 43.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.1 IF TMDD_N97R937_Section_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.1.1 VERIFY that element section-id exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.2 IF TMDD_N97R938_Planned_Signal_Timing_Mode_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.2.1 VERIFY that element planned-signal-timing-mode-description exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.3 IF TMDD_N97R939_Timing_Patten_Identifier_-_Current_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.3.1 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-id-current exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.4 IF TMDD_N97R940_Timing_Pattern_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.4.1 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-description exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.5 IF TMDD_N97R941_Actuation_Mode_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.5.1 VERIFY that element actuation-mode exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.6 IF TMDD_N97R942_Plan_Mode_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.6.1 VERIFY that element timing-phase-plan-mode exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N97R943_Cycle_Length_-_Planned_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that element cycle-length-planned exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N97R944_Cycle_Length_-_Current_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that element cycle-length-current exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N97R945_Cycle_Length_-_Previous_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that element cycle-length-previous exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N97R946_Master_Cycle_Length_-_Actual_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that element cycle-length-master exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N97R947_Controller_Cycle_Counter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that element cycle-counter exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N97R948_Master_Cycle_Counter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that element cycle-counter-master exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N97R949_Offset_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that element offset-reference exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N97R950_Offset_-_Planned_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that element offset-time-planned exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N97R951_Offset_-_Actual_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that element offset-time-current exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N97R952_Offset_-_Previous_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that element offset-time-previous exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N97R953_Controller_Timestamp_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that element controller-timestamp exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N97R954_Phase_Split_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that element phase-split-list exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N97R955_Ring_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that element ring-status-list exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N97R956_Active_Phases_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.20.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-greens exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.20.3 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-walks exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N97R957_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.21.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-greens exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N97R958_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.22.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-yellows exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N97R959_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.23.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-reds exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N97R960_Phase_Status_Walks_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.24.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-walks exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N97R961_Phase_Status_Pedestrian_Clearance_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.25.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-pedclears exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N97R962_Phase_Status_Dont_Walks_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.26.2 VERIFY that element phase-status-group-dontwalks exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.phase-status.phase-status-group
Step 43.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N97R963_Overlap_Phase_Status_Greens_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.27.2 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-greens exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N97R964_Overlap_Phase_Status_Yellows_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.28.2 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-yellows exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N97R965_Overlap_Phase_Status_Reds_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-number exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.29.2 VERIFY that element overlap-status-group-reds exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item.overlap-status.overlap-status-group
Step 43.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N97R966_Special_Functions_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that element active-special-functions-list exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N97R967_Preemption_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 43.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that element preempt-description exists within each instance of intersectionSignalStatusMsg.intersection-signal-status-item
Step 43.1.2.32 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 43.1.2.33 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 43.1.2.34 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalStatusUpdate OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage
